application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 4 (Materials - Bricks only) of planning consent reference 59872/APP/2019/3852 dated 02-11-2020 for 'Redevelopment of the site to provide a mixed-use development comprising 134 residential units (C3 Use Class) and ground floor commercial floorspace (flexible A1/A2/A3/A5/B1 Use Class), with associated car parking, cycle parking and landscaping'.
decision_conditions: This applications relates to the partial discharge of Condition 4 (Materials - Bricks) of planning consent reference 59872/APP/2019/3852 dated 02-11-2020 only. Further details are required to be submitted in order to fully discharge the condition.
